message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the product for $1200000. I think this is a great price considering the value it brings to your business.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I believe that's a more reasonable price considering the market value of the product.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1100000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to ensure I get a fair price for the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $950000. Can you consider that?
I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer the product to you for $990000. This is the best I can do, and I'm hoping we can come to an agreement.
I appreciate your willingness to make a concession, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $980000. Can you consider that?
